android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to read all of the calendar events stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your calendar events to other people.

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.info: add or modify calendar events and send emails to guests
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to add or change the events on your calendar, which may send emails to guests. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your calendar events or to send emails to guests.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

com.patchmedia.android.permission.C2D_ME.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

android.permission.SET_ALARM.description: Allows the application to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock application. Some alarm clock applications may not implement this feature.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.patch.activity.MainActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.patch.activity.InAppActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

playstore_details.title: Patch - Local News
playstore_details.description:
If you're looking for "everything local," Patch is the app for you. Local schools? Check. Breaking news? Check. Homes for sale? We've got those, too. You'll always be in touch with your town with the Patch app.

Check out these features:
•  News and events for 1,200+ Patch Towns, with more towns added every month.
•  Push notifications as important news breaks — you’ll be the first to get the scoop.
•  Swipe left or right to view articles faster.
•  Local weather forecasts and alerts — you'll never be caught without an umbrella or snow boots again.
•  Find local events, jobs and announcements in your area. 
•  Get everything that is happening in your town in a one-scroll feed!
•  Share stories to your Facebook friends or email/SMS to a friend!
•  Love an article? You can bookmark it to your phone to come back and read it later.
•  Want to follow multiple towns? No problem, swipe left or right to navigate between your favorite Patch towns. 

Our new Patch app delivers a beautiful browsing and reading experience for our users. Our pages load lightning fast. You'll never be kept waiting to see what's behind that headline. The sleek design provides an in-depth storytelling experience fueled by concise writing and rich imagery.

The Patch app is only available for users 13 and older.  By downloading the Patch app, you agree to the Patch Terms of Service [https://patch.com/terms]   

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK:
We're eager to hear your feedback and suggestions. How can we make the app even better? What features would you like to see? We aim to be the best news app in the country, and your ideas are crucial. Please email us at Support@patch.com

Images used under license from Shutterstock.com
playstore_details.summary: Stay on top of local news, events and happenings in all the places you love.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Stay on top of local news, events and happenings in all the places you love.
